attributes.action: Annul the result of the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
E.g.
That 350 million pounds per week would go to the NHS instead of EU.
That Britain would be stronger out of the EU.
That voting Leave would prevent immigration into this Country.
That Britain would easily be able to make new trade deals with other countries.

These and many other lies were frequently repeated and memorably depicted on advertising on hoardings and Buses.
attributes.background:
The EU referendum was a very important occasion for Britain.
Boris Johnson, Nigel Farage and Michael Gove produce fraudulent claims prior to the vote.
